text: Mikhaylovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Burlinsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 3 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 37 km from Krasnousolsky, 7 km from Burly. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Mikhaylovka, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
